description: A major city known for shipbuilding, where Tom's Workers operated and where the tragic events of Tom's execution and Franky's near-death took place eight years before the main story.

keyEvents.title: Tom's Workers Framed at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Spandam uses Franky's Battle Franky ships to attack a judicial ship near Water 7, framing Tom's Workers.
keyEvents.significance: This conspiracy sets in motion the events that lead to Tom's death and Franky's transformation.

keyEvents.title: Franky Attempts to Stop the Sea Train at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Franky positions himself on the tracks at Water 7 to stop the Puffing Tom from taking Tom away.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Franky's life changed forever, being run over by the Sea Train.

statusHistory.reason: Water 7 continues to function as a major shipbuilding city

description: Tom's shipbuilding company and workshop on Water 7, where he built the Puffing Tom and trained Franky and Iceburg. It was the site of the trial that led to Tom's execution.

keyEvents.title: Tom Teaches Franky About Pride
keyEvents.description: At Tom's Workers, Tom punches Franky and teaches him the philosophy that shipwrights must take pride in their creations.
keyEvents.significance: This is where Tom imparts his most important lesson to Franky.

keyEvents.title: Tom's Trial at Tom's Workers
keyEvents.description: The trial where Tom accepts responsibility and is sentenced to execution takes place at his workshop.
keyEvents.significance: The location marks the end of Tom's Workers as an active company under Tom's leadership.

statusHistory.reason: Tom's Workers operated until Tom's execution

description: The World Government's judicial island where criminals are sent for judgment. Tom is taken here for execution after sacrificing himself.

keyEvents.title: Tom Sentenced to Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: Tom is sentenced to be taken to Enies Lobby for execution, with the Puffing Tom serving as his transport.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Enies Lobby as Tom's final destination and foreshadows the location's importance in the Water 7 arc.

keyEvents.title: Franky Tries to Prevent Tom from Reaching Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: Franky desperately attempts to stop the Sea Train from taking Tom to Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Enies Lobby as a place of no return and certain death for those taken there.

statusHistory.reason: Enies Lobby functions as the World Government's judicial island

description: The Sea Train built by Tom that connects Water 7 to other islands. In a tragic irony, it becomes the vehicle that takes Tom to his execution and runs over Franky.

keyEvents.title: Franky Attempts to Stop Puffing Tom
keyEvents.description: Franky stands on the tracks and tries to stop the Puffing Tom with his bare hands to save Tom.
keyEvents.significance: The Sea Train becomes a tragic symbol, as Tom's greatest creation is used to take him to his death.

keyEvents.title: Puffing Tom Runs Over Franky
keyEvents.description: The Sea Train runs over Franky, nearly killing him and forcing his transformation into a cyborg.
keyEvents.significance: Tom's creation inadvertently destroys Franky's body, adding to the tragedy of the situation.

statusHistory.reason: The Sea Train continues to operate
